title: Who Is Jay Glazer’s Wife? Rosie Tenison’s Job & Relationship History
description: Many fans are curious to discover more about the relationship history between Jay Glazer and his wife. author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Read on to find out all about Jay Glazer's wife Rosie Tenison, how they met, and more details about the couple.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Many fans are curious to discover more about the relationship history between Jay Glazer and his wife. Glazer is a popular sports reporter and television personality, who is best known for being the NFL insider for Fox’s pregame show FOX NFL Sunday. He has also hosted several other sports shows and has also guest starred on popular series like Ballers and The League. Here’s everything fans need to know about Jay Glazer’s wife, how they met, and the details of the couple’s relationship history. Who is Jay Glazer’s wife? Jay Glazer is married to Rosie Tenison. Tenison was born in Caldwell, Idaho, on December 2, 1968, and has an identical twin sister Renee, with whom she shares the spotlight. What is Rosie Tenison’s job? Rosie Tenison is a model, actress, and businesswoman. Both the Tenison twins have paved the way for Black models in the industry. They have worked as models for several well-known brands and magazines. Although Rosie never became a Playboy Playmate like her sister Renee, she posed for the August 2002 issue of Playboy magazine alongside her. The twins are best remembered for being the DoubleMint Twins from the DoubleMint commercials. Besides modeling, Rosie Tenison has also appeared in a number of movies and television shows in the 90s such as The Jamie Foxx Show, The Parkers, L.A. Heat, and White Man’s Burden. Additionally, Tenison is the co-founder of the LA-based clothing brand Varga. Jay Glazer and Rosie Tenison’s relationship history Jay Glazer first met Rosie Tenison in 2020 during the COVID 19 lockdown. Rosie and her sister Renee knew Glazer’s assistant, Nikki Ziering, whom they would often hang out with at his house. Glazer and Tenison hit it off on the third visit to Ziering’s house, and the two began dating soon after. Three years later, the couple got engaged on February 23, 2023, after an impromptu proposal during their vacation to Thailand. The following year they eloped to Italy and finally tied the knot on May 7, 2024. Glazer and Tenison had an intimate wedding ceremony at the Borgo Santandrea Hotel on the Amalfi Coast.
html:
Many fans are curious to discover more about the relationship history between Jay Glazer and his wife. Glazer is a popular sports reporter and television personality, who is best known for being the NFL insider for Fox’s pregame show FOX NFL Sunday. He has also hosted several other sports shows and has also guest starred on popular series like Ballers and The League.

Here’s everything fans need to know about Jay Glazer’s wife, how they met, and the details of the couple’s relationship history.

Who is Jay Glazer’s wife?

Jay Glazer is married to Rosie Tenison.

Tenison was born in Caldwell, Idaho, on December 2, 1968, and has an identical twin sister Renee, with whom she shares the spotlight.

What is Rosie Tenison’s job?

Rosie Tenison is a model, actress, and businesswoman.

Both the Tenison twins have paved the way for Black models in the industry. They have worked as models for several well-known brands and magazines. Although Rosie never became a Playboy Playmate like her sister Renee, she posed for the August 2002 issue of Playboy magazine alongside her. The twins are best remembered for being the DoubleMint Twins from the DoubleMint commercials.

Besides modeling, Rosie Tenison has also appeared in a number of movies and television shows in the 90s such as The Jamie Foxx Show, The Parkers, L.A. Heat, and White Man’s Burden. Additionally, Tenison is the co-founder of the LA-based clothing brand Varga.

Jay Glazer and Rosie Tenison’s relationship history

Jay Glazer first met Rosie Tenison in 2020 during the COVID 19 lockdown. Rosie and her sister Renee knew Glazer’s assistant, Nikki Ziering, whom they would often hang out with at his house. Glazer and Tenison hit it off on the third visit to Ziering’s house, and the two began dating soon after. Three years later, the couple got engaged on February 23, 2023, after an impromptu proposal during their vacation to Thailand. The following year they eloped to Italy and finally tied the knot on May 7, 2024. Glazer and Tenison had an intimate wedding ceremony at the Borgo Santandrea Hotel on the Amalfi Coast.
